<style>
/* Container for all team members */
.team-container {
display: flex;
flex-wrap: wrap;
gap: 30px;
justify-content: center;
margin-top: 20px;
}

/* Individual team member card */
.team-member {
position: relative;        
text-align: center;
max-width: 180px;
transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
cursor: pointer;              
}

/* Circular headshots */
.team-member img {
width: 150px;
height: 150px;
border-radius: 50%;
object-fit: cover;
border: 2px solid #ccc;
box-shadow: 0px 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

/* Hover zoom + shadow */
.team-member img:hover {
transform: scale(1.1);
box-shadow: 0px 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
}

/* Name and role */
.team-member h3 {
margin: 10px 0 0 0;
font-size: 1.1em;
}

.team-member p {
margin: 2px 0 0 0;
font-size: 0.9em;
color: #555;
}

/* Bio popup */
.team-member .bio {
visibility: hidden;                 /* hidden by default */
opacity: 0;
width: 220px;                       /* adjust as needed */
background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.95);
color: #fff;
text-align: center;
padding: 10px;
border-radius: 8px;
position: absolute;
bottom: 100%;                        /* appear above the card */
left: 50%;
transform: translateX(-50%);
z-index: 1;
transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
font-size: 0.9em;
pointer-events: none;               /* prevents flicker on hover */
}

/* Arrow under the popup */
.team-member .bio::after {
content: "";
position: absolute;
top: 100%;
left: 50%;
margin-left: -6px;
border-width: 6px;
border-style: solid;
border-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.85) transparent transparent transparent;
}

/* Show popup on hover */
.team-member:hover .bio {
visibility: visible;
opacity: 1;
}
</style>
